title: तथ्य-जाँच: पीएम मोदी का दावा कि कांग्रेस सबसे कम सीटों पर 2019 का चुनाव लड़ रही है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
It is troubling that PM is so ill-informed & this has reflected on his governance

But I will clarify two things

1)Congress is not contesting its lowest ever seats,hence media is not highlighting his false claims

2)In 2004 we contested even lesser seats & still formed govt pic.twitter.com/rljC7GArmA
